ctx: intros h st t src lli llt st' m t' h' H_handle H_in.
exceptions.tactic: apply votes_update_elections_data_request_vote in H_in as [H_in_votes | [H_eq_term H_votedFor]].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (src : fin N) (lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg) (t' : term) (h' : name), handleRequestVote h (snd st) t src lli llt = (st', m) -> In (t', h') (votes (update_elections_data_requestVote h src t src lli llt st)) -> In (t', h') (votes (fst st)) \\/ t' = currentTerm st' /\\ votedFor st' = Some h'" on hypothesis of type "In (t', h') (votes (fst st))".

exceptions.exn: The reference st was not found in the current environment.

original: intros h st t src lli llt st' m t' h' H_handle H_in. apply votes_update_elections_data_request_vote in H_in as [H_in_votes | [H_eq_term H_votedFor]]. - auto. - destruct (handleRequestVote_cases h src t lli llt (snd st) st' m H_handle) as [H_st' | [H_adv | [H_votedFor_cases [H_votedNone | H_term_less]]]]. + subst. contradiction. + subst. simpl. left. auto. + subst. destruct H_votedNone as [H_none H_curr_eq]. exfalso. apply Nat.lt_irrefl with (n := currentTerm (snd st)). auto.
